summary: This is the custom layout I\'ve been using for months now.
descriptionHtml:
[Changelog]

After a little thinking. I added a new settup for those who play as a vampire lord or werewolf. Now you can acces their respective skill trees by pressing Y+B

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a custom controller layout I set up for myself and have been using for months now. Figured I\'d share it, just in case someone else might like it.

[Standard]

L-Stick: Move character
L3: Sneak
R-Stick: Move Camera
R3: Change POV

LB: Sprint
RB: Shout/Abilities
LT: Off Hand Attack/Shield
RT: Main hand Attack

X: Action
B: Sheath/Draw Weapon
A: Jump
Y: HOLD for Quick Menu

Dpad Left: Hotkey 1
Dpad Right: Hotkey 3
Dpad Down: Hotkey 5
Dpad Up: Hotkey 7

Back: Favorites Menu
Start: Journal

[Alt] - (Hold LB)

L3: Auto Run

B: Quick Save

Dpad Left: Hotkey 2
Dpad Right: Hotkey 4
Dpad Down: Hotkey 6
Dpad Up: Hotkey 8

Back: Wait

[Quick Load] - (Hold RB)

Start

(I decided to move \"Quick load\" to a different setup than \"Quick Save\" because I accidentally Quick loaded my games a few times while actually trying to Quick save. So, by making it a different setup, muscle memory won\'t allow this to happen)

[Quick Menu] - (Hold Y)

Dpad Left: Magicks Menu
Dpad Right: Inventory
Dpad Down: Map
Dpad Up: Skills Menu

[Menu Navigation]

Move - L-Stick (DPad - Does not work on favorites menu)
A: Accept
B: Cancel
author: Izeck

files.name: Xbox 360 Controller Layout Vampire Lord-Werewolf Skill tree access
